Assembler Syntax

AE_MULAF48Q32SP16U.L aed0..15(opnd_ae_sem_mul_x2_S1_q0), aed0..15(opnd_ae_sem_mul_x2_S1_d0), aed0..15(opnd_ae_sem_mul_x2_S1_d1)

C Syntax

#include <xtensa/tie/xt_hifi2.h>

extern void AE_MULAF48Q32SP16U_L(ae_q56s d /*inout*/, ae_q56s d0, ae_p24x2s d1);

Description

AE_MULAF48Q32SP16U.L is a 32-bit signed x 16-bit unsigned fraction multiply-add without saturation. Fixed point values represent the range [-1.0 ... 1.0). The 32-bit input is from d0[47:16] and the 16-bit input is from d1[23:8]. The result is accumulated (addition) into an AE_DR register, without saturation. This instruction is provided mainly for compatibility with HiFi 2.

Implementation Pipeline

In Out
opnd_ae_sem_mul_x2_S1_q0 Wstage, opnd_ae_sem_mul_x2_S1_d0 Mstage, opnd_ae_sem_mul_x2_S1_d1 Mstage opnd_ae_sem_mul_x2_S1_q0 Wstage

Protos that use AE_MULAF48Q32SP16U.L

AE_SEL16I tp, d1, d1, 1;
AE_MULAF48Q32SP16U.L d, d0, tp;
}

AE_MULAF48Q32SP16U.L d, d0, d1;
}
